QuestData.Title: Scars from the Past
QuestData.Description:
A tribe of tauren came to the Dragon Isles led by a close friend of mine, Bovan Windtotem. No one has heard from them since they entered these plains.
If they have gone missing, then I must find them. Unfortunately, I underestimated the size of this place.
You have an existing relationship with the centaur. Will you go speak with them and see if they have any information on Bovan or his tribe?
Perhaps they can help narrow down my search.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ask the Maruuk centaur about the disappearance of Bovan Windtotem.
